about_the_game:
This is a game about mushrooms. In this game, because a level is not very long, there is no save point (if it is, it is not interesting), we just need to control the mushroom to keep jumping upwards and constantly reaching higher places. The game doesn't have a complicated UI interface and is constantly being updated.The game also takes place in a fantastic world...
This is a casual parkour mini-game, a game about mushrooms. In this game, because a level is not very long, there is no save point (if it is, it is not interesting), we just need to control the mushroom to keep jumping upwards and constantly reaching higher places. The game doesn't have a complicated UI interface and is constantly being updated. The game takes place in a fantastic world
> playthrough takes up to five minutes, allowing players to quickly experience the game screen
> there are no save points in the whole process, which makes the speed limit soar under the kidney! There is no plot in the whole process, and we are fully engaged in the game experience, so we directly optimized the plot
> perfectly optimized No configuration requirements The settings page is simple—there are no setup options at all
> from the basic level, the lower limit of configuration requirements = upper limit makes the slag machine run perfectly in a sense, and the highest image quality
At present, the first level of the game has been launched

highlighted.name: Why does pigs go up trees

detailed_description:
This is a game about mushrooms. In this game, because a level is not very long, there is no save point (if it is, it is not interesting), we just need to control the mushroom to keep jumping upwards and constantly reaching higher places. The game doesn't have a complicated UI interface and is constantly being updated.The game also takes place in a fantastic world...
This is a casual parkour mini-game, a game about mushrooms. In this game, because a level is not very long, there is no save point (if it is, it is not interesting), we just need to control the mushroom to keep jumping upwards and constantly reaching higher places. The game doesn't have a complicated UI interface and is constantly being updated. The game takes place in a fantastic world
> playthrough takes up to five minutes, allowing players to quickly experience the game screen
> there are no save points in the whole process, which makes the speed limit soar under the kidney! There is no plot in the whole process, and we are fully engaged in the game experience, so we directly optimized the plot
> perfectly optimized No configuration requirements The settings page is simple—there are no setup options at all
> from the basic level, the lower limit of configuration requirements = upper limit makes the slag machine run perfectly in a sense, and the highest image quality
At present, the first level of the game has been launched
name: MushroomJump/蘑菇跳跳

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,Windows 10,Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 @3.50GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,Windows 10,Windows 11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: This is a casual parkour game where you are a mushroom. Control it to continuously jump upwards to reach the finish line without saving points, so be careful not to fall or fall.
